sentences.text: Dear Shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Together with the Equifax management team, we are focused on enhancing financial value, driving operational growth and advancing the interests of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to update you on the significant financial, operational and governance actions and shareholder outreach efforts undertaken over the last year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Financial Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the leadership of our CEO, Rick Smith, Equifax has achieved outstanding growth and performance since September 2005, including total shareholder returns 103% greater than the S&P 500 Index shareholder return and market capitalization growth from $4.3 billion to $15.7 billion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We produced record results in 2016, enabling us to make significant investments to secure future growth while delivering outstanding shareholder returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the past year, we completed the largest acquisition in our history, developed and delivered powerful new analytical insights and expanded our global presence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also returned significant capital to our shareholders through a total of $157.6 million in dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Together, our Board, executive management and all other Equifax team members are building a company that is positioned for future growth and continued profitability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Engagement and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to our Board-directed shareholder engagement program, we are engaged in thoughtful and constructive dialogue with a significant portion of our shareholder base.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Interactions with investors have provided us with valuable feedback on our Board composition, corporate governance and executive compensation practices over the past year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the past year, senior management connected with approximately 60% of our shareholder base, including the majority of our top 50 shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Below are just a few of the areas we focused on as part of our commitment to our Company and our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Diversity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we took action in response to encouragement from our shareholders to ensure that we establish a diverse pool of director candidates for consideration by the Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last year, we elected Ms. Elane Stock to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Stock brings significant experience in international consumer business operations, which is particularly important as Equifax develops and markets new products across the globe.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we identify future director candidates as part of our ongoing succession planning, we are committed to seeking candidates who offer diverse backgrounds and fresh perspectives along with the requisite skills, experience and character necessary to serve on our Board and represent our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Refreshment and Succession Planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our current Board reflects a diverse and engaged group of directors with relevant skills and backgrounds to oversee the Companys strategy for future growth and long-term value creation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee uses a comprehensive process to identify candidates who can contribute to the overall effectiveness of the Board and has engaged an independent search firm to help identify individuals from a diverse candidate pool.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of our succession planning, we regularly review Board composition and committee assignments in light of future retirements in order to facilitate a smooth transition and to foster the right mix of subject matter expertise, capabilities and perspectives in the boardroom.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since our last annual meeting, we added two new independent directors to our BoardElane Stock and Tom Hough.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, Ms. Stock will be a valuable resource due to her extensive strategy, operations and multi-national experience in global consumer and B2B businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Houghs public accounting expertise and managerial experience provide us with an invaluable resource with regard to audit and finance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His qualification as an audit committee financial expert will ensure that the Audit Committee continues to maintain an extensive depth of knowledge, despite upcoming director retirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We want to thank Jim Copeland, who will be retiring from the Board in May.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are grateful for his thoughtful and balanced approach to Board oversight and his financial, strategic and operational expertise over the last 13 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we plan for the retirements of Walt Driver and Phil Humann in 2018, we are committed to selecting the best qualified director candidates to oversee the Companys business and serve the interests of our shareholders well into the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In direct response to shareholder input, we adopted a new bylaw provision that gives significant long- term shareholders the right to nominate prospective Board members in the Companys proxy statement, beginning with next years annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The time we have invested and all of these actions have helped to ensure that our Board is situated to actively and effectively oversee the management of our Company and protect the long-term interests of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We appreciate the opportunity to serve Equifax on your behalf, and cordially invite you to our Annual Meeting of Shareholders on May 4, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Investment and Innovation For Long-Term, Sustainable Growth
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 was a remarkable year for our Company and our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We exceeded expectations and delivered strong, profitable growth and shareholder returns across the vast majority of our geographies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business units and corporate centers of excellence contributed to these outstanding results by consistently executing on strategic initiatives and leveraging our position on a global scale.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other achievements, we acquired and integrated Veda Group Limitedthe largest acquisition in company historypositioning us for growth in the Asia Pacific geography and further broadening our global presence in important growth markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also executed on our strategy to invest in our talent base, growing our Company by 16.5% to approximately 9,500 employees worldwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is well positioned for a strong 2017 and beyond.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We remain dedicated to the five strategic imperatives that have underpinned our success over the past decade and allowed us to globalize fundamental management disciplines and facilitate greater linkage between our strategy and execution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This operational scale will increase our capacity to continue investing in initiatives to drive innovation and growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With a compelling vision, dedication to operational excellence and strong commitment to our shareholders, we are uniquely positioned to create unparalleled analytical insights, which will drive our delivery of long-term, sustainable growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Engagement Actions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continued delivery of sustainable, long-term value to our shareholders requires regular engagement with our investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we conducted investor outreach meetings with shareholders representing approximately 60% of our shares, during which we discussed corporate governance, executive compensation and other issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our investors comments are reviewed and considered by our Governance and Compensation Committees, as well as the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Diversity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our shareholders expressed general support of our corporate governance practices in our engagement discussions, and also highlighted the importance of a diverse board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that diversity of experiences, gender, ethnicity and age plays a pivotal role in constructing an effective leadership structure, and is committed to considering these factors as it contemplates future director candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with this belief, the Governance Committee seeks to evaluate a diverse pool of candidates when selecting a new director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In November 2016, we elected Ms. Elane Stock to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Refreshment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board recognizes the importance of Board refreshment and succession planning and we have engaged with investors regularly on these topics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In view of the near-term scheduled retirement of three independent directors, the Governance Committee has implemented a strategy to effect a smooth transition of the Board, to fill the gaps in experience these vacancies may create, and to anticipate future needs for expertise and skill sets in new and emerging markets, technology, security and regulatory compliance, while also enhancing the diversity on our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2013, we have appointed three new independent directors and decreased the average non-management tenure of our director nominees from 10.4 years to 8.8 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After thoughtful discussions with several of our shareholders during 2016 and prior years, we adopted a bylaw provision allowing shareholders to nominate directors and have such nominees included in the proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our new proxy access bylaw provision enables a shareholder or group of up to 20 shareholders who have held 3% of our stock for 3 years to nominate up to 20% of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Double-Trigger Change-in-Control Provisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following discussions with shareholders and a review of our long-term incentive program, beginning in 2017, equity awards to our NEOs will include a double-trigger change-in-control provision to limit accelerated vesting in the event of a change in control of Equifax to those situations where an executive is terminated without cause or the acquirer fails to assume the awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We already have double-trigger structures in place for other aspects of our compensation program.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Refreshment      The Governance Committee has established a succession plan with the assistance of an independent executive search consultant to identify highly-qualified and diverse director candidates to replace three independent directors who are scheduled to retire in 2017 and 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, pursuant to this succession plan, the Board elected two new independent directorsMs.

sentences.text: Elane Stock and Mr. Thomas Houghreflecting diversity of gender, skills, experience and background.

sentences.text: Upon election of the Boards nominees at the Annual Meeting, the average non-management director tenure will be 8.8 years.

sentences.text: Independent Presiding Director      Our independent directors elect our Presiding Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In May 2016, Mark L. Feidler was elected to serve as Presiding Director in the place of L. Phillip Humann.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Presiding Director has broad powers including:   advising the Chairman and CEO of decisions reached, and suggestions made, at the executive session of the non-management directors;   calling meetings of the non-management directors and approving agendas;   facilitating communication between the non-employee directors and the Chairman and CEO;   meeting directly with management and non-management employees of the Company; and   being available for consultation and direct communication with shareholders, as appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Board Leadership Evaluation and Succession Planning      The Board annually reviews the leadership structure to determine whether a combined Chairman and CEO role or separate roles are in the best interests of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board annually evaluates the CEOs performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board annually conducts a rigorous review and assessment of the succession planning process for the CEO and other top officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Director Election      Each director is elected on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Limits on Outside Board Service      Outside directors are limited to service on four other public company boards and our CEO is limited to two other public company boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, no director serves on more than two other public company boards and our CEO does not serve on any other public company boards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Stock Ownership      Each director is required to own Equifax common stock with a market value of at least five times his or her annual cash retainer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Hedging and Pledging Policies      Our insider trading policy bars our directors, officers and employees from owning financial instruments or participating in investment strategies that hedge the economic risk of owning Equifax stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We prohibit executive officers and directors from pledging Equifax securities as collateral for loans (including margin loans).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access Bylaws      In early 2017, our Board adopted a proxy access bylaw provision that allows shareholders meeting certain requirements to nominate directors and have such nominees included in the proxy statementcommonly referred to as proxy access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Poison Pill      We do not have a poison pill plan in place.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Enterprise Risk Management      We have a rigorous enterprise risk management program targeting controls over operational, financial, legal/regulatory compliance, reputational, technology, privacy, data security, strategic and other risks that could adversely affect our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The program also includes crisis management and business continuity planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See How We Manage Risk and Board Risk Oversight on page 21.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Enhanced Political Engagement Oversight      In early 2017, our Board adopted a political engagement policy regarding Company political activity, including corporate political expenditures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee has oversight authority pursuant to this new policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We disclose aggregate annual political contributions made directly by the Company with corporate funds on our corporate website.
